div:
A patient encounter is further characterized by the setting in which it takes place, amongst them are ambulatory, emergency, home health, inpatient and virtual visits. An Encounter encompasses the lifecycle from planning, the actual visit (for ambulatory visits), and admission, stay and discharge (for inpatient visits). During the visit the patient may move from practitioner to practitioner and location to location.
